resources.string: 3- If the player fails to complete the task on time, he/she will drink the amount of shot specified above
2- Once the host has finished naming the command, the host will click on the counter and the player will have 10 seconds to complete the command
1- The host selects a player by saying his name, then names the prompt he has to complete
3- The player with the most votes will have to take the amount of shots mentioned
2- The players will have to decide who of those present best fits the question
1- The host asks the question that appears on the screen
2- If any of the players present did the above, they have to take the amount of shot specified above
1- Sentences always start with "Never have i ever"
Please be responsible and drink in moderation \nTrustlyApps is not responsible in case of an accident, incident or any situation related to excessive alcohol intake
